title: Meta Just Proved People Hate Chronological Feeds
description: Some social media users and lawmakers say chronological feeds are healthier. A new study found that Facebook and Instagram users who were forced to see time-ranked posts turned to TikTok instead.

title: Meta’s Election Research Opens More Questions Than It Answers
description: Researchers were given unprecedented access to Meta’s data during the 2020 elections. Meta says their results show its platforms don’t cause political polarization. That’s not entirely true.

title: More Battlefield AI Will Make the Fog of War More Deadly
description: The Pentagon’s embrace of military AI raises questions about what limits should be placed on the technology—and how to keep humans in control.

title: Big AI Won’t Stop Election Deepfakes With Watermarks
description: Experts warn of a new age of AI-driven disinformation. A voluntary agreement brokered by the White House doesn’t go nearly far enough to address those risks.
